com.erikligai.doctorplzsaveme.backend

Class Backend

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.erikligai.doctorplzsaveme.backend.Backend
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICareProviderBackend, IPatientBackend

    public class Backend
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPatientBackend, ICareProviderBackend
    This class is a Singleton class which holds, writes, fetches data for the rest of the app. This includes the patient profile(s), data for CP, etc.

      THIS MUST BE CALLED WHENEVER A CHANGE TO PROFILE AND ITS MEMBERS IS MADE syncs the current patient with DB (if it can) by fetching DB comments (if CP has made a change to comments, overriding the local comments, and pushing the local profile to DB)
